short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To redirect the URL from X to Y based on exclude filter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool is use when we need to auto redirect the url from x to y. In addition have option to allow the excluded path.

Steps:
Click on tool --> Select Options tab --> Configure your rules

Example:
Source url is https://www.xyz.com?someparam=somevalue&anotherparam=anothervalue & the destination expected is https://www.abc.com?someparam=somevalue&anotherparam=anothervalue but don't want the route when path contains /checkout as https://www.xyz.com/checkout?someparam=somevalue&anotherparam=anothervalue
